aboutSection.title: Bridging the Skills Gap for India's Future
aboutSection.paragraph1: GreyBeez is a pioneering social enterprise dedicated to transforming lives through skills development and employment generation. We specialize in empowering rural and tribal youth with market-ready skills, creating sustainable employment opportunities that drive both individual growth and economic development.
aboutSection.feature4: Focus on rural and tribal communities
aboutSection.cardDescription: Our holistic approach ensures sustainable impact across rural India

programSpotlight.title: AMAS Program Spotlight
programSpotlight.description: Our flagship Aggregate Model for Skilling program provides comprehensive solutions for workforce development and employment generation

comprehensiveTraining.title: Comprehensive Training
comprehensiveTraining.description: Industry-relevant skills training designed in partnership with leading manufacturers

migrationSupport.title: Migration Support
migrationSupport.description: End-to-end support for safe and successful migration to employment opportunities

careerGrowth.title: Career Growth
careerGrowth.description: Continuous support for career advancement and skill upgradation

impactMeasurement.title: Impact Measurement
impactMeasurement.description: Comprehensive tracking and reporting of program outcomes and social impact

testimonials.title: Success Stories
testimonials.description: Real stories from real people whose lives have been transformed through our programs

testimonial1.name: Priya Devi
testimonial1.content: GreyBeez transformed my life completely. From a small village to working in a top manufacturing company, the journey has been incredible. The training and support were exceptional.

testimonial2.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonial2.content: Partnering with GreyBeez has been game-changing for our workforce needs. Their candidates are well-trained, motivated, and ready to contribute from day one.

testimonial3.name: Sunita Devi
testimonial3.content: The migration support and ongoing mentorship made all the difference. I now have a stable job and can support my family while pursuing further career growth.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: Get in touch with us. We'd love to hear from you and answer any questions you might have.
contactUs.message: Ready to transform lives through skills development? Let's discuss how we can work together to create sustainable employment opportunities.
contactUs.name: Your Name
contactUs.locationDescription: Visit our office in the heart of Gurgaon's business district. We're located near Excel textiles in Sector 37, Khandsa.
contactUs.mapDescription: Click below to open the exact location in Google Maps for directions and navigation.
contactUs.expertise: Expertise in rural and tribal youth development
